item.title: Teaching
item.description:
Fall 2023:

  • Distributed Systems and Security

Spring 2023:

  • Systems Security
  • Computer Architecture, Operating Systems and Networks

Fall 2022:

  • Network Security
  • Distributed Systems and Security
  • Secure Distributed Systems and Advanced Cryptology

Fall 2020:

Fall 2019:

  • Fundamentals of Computer Security

2011–2013: University of Brasília
